attributes.review: This app started to glitch after i have installed it . I was trying to be supportive and support you trump , but my phone kept glitching so i had to uninstall the app . I do not recommend using this app until after the issue is fixed. Thank you!
attributes.title: DONT INSTALL

attributes.review: When I got on this app it was glitching and running very slow. It just gave me weird vibes and it also made my phone malfunction and Siri started cussing me out. My phone also got a virus and now it has corona I do not recommend this app it is very unsettling🧚🏾‍♂️✨

attributes.review: This is by far one of the worst apps in history, it promotes violence, hatred, and is trying to brainwash younger citizens. The only people that rate this app highly are fascists, bigots, and/or white supremacists and that’s not the thing that “makes this country great” if the POTUS was half a good man he’d resign and take this manipulative app down with him!
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I hate that in order for you to use the app it’s requiring to give your phone number. I don’t want to give out my phone number,  I don’t want phone calls.  Therefore this app is useless to me. Deleted it from my phone
attributes.title: Phone number

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my loving non-racist/pedo/misogynistic president. And it took 6 days to load 😞 and as soon as it finished all i could see was orange the color surrounding me, i am deeply terrified and i demand there to be a ⚠️ warning ⚠️ for this side effect the public deserves to know before they themselves get hurt 😔
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️✨orange ✨🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.review: Very terrible app, it crash and made my phone lag and started acting very dumb. So i tried restarting my phone and all it did was keep crashing and bugging my phone! Please fix or take down app immediately!🗿

attributes.review: It took forever to download this app, even after I got it, it started to glitch and ruined everything. It gave me such weird vibes after downloading. It took so much of my storage and time that I wish I never even bothered to download it.

attributes.review: This app will make your phone glitch and takes forever to download. My screen went all black I tried turning it off and on and that made no difference I had to go out & get a new phone man I tried to support you rapist but how can I do that now ?? FT2020 !!
attributes.title: DON’T GET THIS APP !

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to not support my white supremacists , racist , homophobic , orange President. I downloaded the app and my phone crashed 😖 this is such a terrible thing.
